thread.title: Completely Free Wii U Emulator Released for Windows
thread.title_full: Completely Free Wii U Emulator Released for Windows - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Completely Free Wii U Emulator Released for Windows
text: A new Wii U emulator has been released for the Windows platform. It's called Cemu and is now freely available to anyone who wants it. If you're a fan of the Wii U platform, and you happen to have a Windows 7 OS or above lying around, then you're in luck. The Cemu Wii Emulator has just been released, and it's capable of running and rendering commercial games, but there is a catch. The problem with these emulators is that the hardware used in the Wii U is not the same as what... Â»
